name: Geometric Art Series #2
description:
This series explores the relation between forms, spatial compositions and colours.
The gif is generated in the WEBGL mode of the web canvas with p5.js (javascript).

A generated GIF loop by Pizza Punk (Jerome Mercier - twitter @GenerativePunk), France.
GIF LOOP | 640x640px | 200 Frames | 30 FPS | Seed : 14306

November 2021
